tool_description: Parses and extracts wallet data from various backup file formats including JSON wallets, encrypted keystores, and wallet export files from popular wallet applications.

backup_content.description: Raw content of the backup file as string

file_format.description: Format of backup file: json, keystore, electrum, exodus, metamask, trust_wallet

validate_structure.description: Validate backup file structure before parsing

error_messages: Invalid backup format: Supported formats are [json, keystore, electrum, exodus, metamask, trust_wallet].
Backup file corrupted: File structure is invalid or corrupted.
Decryption failed: Incorrect password or corrupted encrypted data.
Missing required fields: Backup file is missing essential wallet data fields.
Unsupported backup version: Backup file version is not supported.
usage: Provide backup_content and file_format, include password for encrypted files. Set validate_structure to verify file integrity before parsing.

wallet_type.description: Type of wallet found in backup

extracted_data.description: JSON string containing extracted wallet data
